statement.desc: OpenAPI 서비스 테이블 DDL 및 초기 데이터 입력 적용
데이터베이스 현재 시간 및 서버명 조회

commands.statement: SELECT COUNT(*) AS IsExists FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = :TableName;

SELECT A.APIServiceID , A.InterfaceID , A.InterfaceName , A.DataSourceID , A.CommandText , A.Descriptions , A.DefaultFormat , A.FormatJsonYN , A.FormatXmlYN , A.FormatSoapYN , A.FormatRssYN , A.FormatAtomYN , A.LimitPeriod , A.LimitCallCount , A.LimitIPAddressYN , A.AccessControl , A.CacheDuration FROM APIService A WHERE A.UseYN = 'Y' AND A.DeleteYN = 'N' AND A.InterfaceID = :InterfaceID;
SELECT DS.DataSourceID , DS.DataProvider , DS.ConnectionString , DS.IsEncryption FROM DataSource DS WHERE DS.DataSourceID = :DataSourceID;

SELECT AMA.AccessID , AMA.MemberNo , AMA.SecretKey , AMA.IPAddress , AMA.LimitPeriod , AMA.LimitCallCount , AMA.RequestCallCount , AMA.CumulativeCallCount FROM APIService A INNER JOIN AccessMemberAPI AMA ON A.APIServiceID = AMA.APIServiceID WHERE A.UseYN = 'Y' AND A.DeleteYN = 'N' AND AMA.UseYN = 'Y' AND AMA.DeleteYN = 'N' AND A.APIServiceID = :APIServiceID AND AMA.AccessID = :AccessID;
SELECT AP.ParameterID , AP.ParameterType , AP.Length , AP.DefaultValue , AP.RequiredYN FROM APIParameter AP WHERE AP.APIServiceID = :APIServiceID;

statement.desc: 기간 내 호출 수 제한 조건 일일 자동 갱신

commands.statement: UPDATE AccessMemberAPI SET (LimitCallCount, LimitPeriod, RequestCallCount) = ( SELECT A.LimitCallCount, A.LimitPeriod, 0 FROM APIService A WHERE A.UseYN = 'Y' AND A.DeleteYN = 'N' AND A.APIServiceID = AccessMemberAPI.APIServiceID AND A.LimitPeriod = :LimitPeriod ) WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM APIService A WHERE A.UseYN = 'Y' AND A.DeleteYN = 'N' AND A.APIServiceID = AccessMemberAPI.APIServiceID AND A.LimitPeriod = :LimitPeriod );
